items.sentence: Tom wore an orange hat. His coat was orange too.
Tom went to the corner store to buy some butter.
Tom wears the same Halloween costume every year.
Tom was seriously injured in a traffic accident.
Tom has attempted suicide three times this year.
Tom has a German shepherd and Mary has a poodle.
Tom felt dizzy after blowing up thirty balloons.
Tom didn't even try to convince Mary to do that.
Tom asked Mary where she had bought her bicycle.
Tom asked Mary to keep doing what she was doing.
Tom asked Mary to be more careful the next time.
The doctors assured Tom that Mary would recover.
Neither Tom nor Mary has spent any time in jail.
Neither Tom nor Mary has caused us much trouble.
Neither Tom nor Mary has begun to look for work.
If by any chance Tom comes, give him this paper.
Earlier, Tom was on the balcony talking to Mary.
Tom takes care of the kids on Monday afternoons.
Tom said that he wanted to speak to the manager.
Tom put his glasses on the table beside his bed.
